TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit ClipboardData extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents the data passed around with the clipboard.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The ClipboardData contains three types of data:
- The data itself, accessed through the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ClipboardData.Data%2A> property.
- The metadata, accessed through the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ClipboardData.Metadata%2A> property.
- The version information, accessed through the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ClipboardData.Version%2A> property.
## Examples [!code-cs[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPkgContent](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/XpsCreate/XpsCreate.cs#xpscreateaddpkgcontent)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Gets or sets the data passed around on the clipboard.
Docs.value: A <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> of type <xref:System.Object> that contains the data passed around on the clipboard.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the metadata passed around on the clipboard.
Docs.value: A <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> of type <xref:System.Object> that contains the metadata passed around on the clipboard.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the version information passed around on the clipboard.
Docs.value: The version information passed around on the clipboard.
